name: d2l-inputs
description: Polymer-based web components for D2L inputs

scripts.lint: npm run lint:wc && npm run lint:html
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run test:polymer:local
scripts.dump:galen:local:run: npm run galen -- dump test/acceptance/galen.test.js -g factory:local -d test/acceptance/dumps
scripts.galen:local:run: npm run galen -- test test/acceptance/galen.test.js -g factory:local -- -p4
scripts.galen:sauce:run: sc-run -- npm run galen -- test test/acceptance/galen.test.js -g factory:sauce -i SAUCE_USERNAME SAUCE_ACCESS_KEY TRAVIS_REPO_SLUG TRAVIS_BUILD_NUMBER -- -p4
scripts.dump:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run dump:galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:local: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:local:run"
scripts.test:galen:sauce: concurrently -p name -n serve,galen -s first -k "polymer serve" "npm run galen:sauce:run"

author: D2L Corporation
